name: forex_pair_neutral_30q
title: 30 Neutral Forex Pair Questions (Binary Choice)
description: Neutral, fact-based comparison of two currencies. Each question forces a binary choice between the pair components.

variables.name: texts
variables.description: Recent headlines, summaries, transcripts, and reports relevant to both currencies.

prompt.system: You are a decisive FX analyst. Answer strictly with JSON using only the provided currency codes.
instructions: For each question, respond with exactly one code: ${base_currency} or ${quote_currency}.
Treat each item independently and make a firm choice even if the evidence is balanced.
Support each answer with a concise factual rationale referencing the available information.
After completing all 30 questions, count how many selections favor ${base_currency} versus ${quote_currency} to compute the net score.
notes: Do not mention the words "base" or "quote" in explanationsâ€”refer to the currencies directly.
